alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 4:59AM MST until February 25 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 2 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create slick road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This includes highways 20, 287, and 220, as well as Interstate 25.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
